questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs should be interchanged to make the given equation correct?</p>

<p>60&nbsp;&times;&nbsp;4 + 9&nbsp;&divide;&nbsp;3 - 8 = 34</p>

english.explanation: To solve the equation 60 × 4 + 9 ÷ 3 - 8 = 34, we test swapping ÷ and ×. The modified equation becomes 60 ÷ 4 + 9 × 3 - 8. Calculating step-by-step: 60 ÷ 4 = 15, 9 × 3 = 27, then 15 + 27 - 8 = 34. This satisfies the equation.
Leafy Vegetables (L) are a subset of Salad (S), and Salad is a subset of Food (F). The correct Venn diagram should show concentric circles where L is entirely within S, which is entirely within F.

hindi.explanation: पत्तेदार सब्जियाँ ले सलाद का एक उपसमूह है और सलाद भोजन का एक उपसमूह है। पहली वेन आकृति इस संबंध को सही दर्शाती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following numbers will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>15, ?, 27, 39, 55, 75</p>

english.explanation: The series increases by +4, +8, +12, +16, +20. Starting from 15: 15 +4=19, 19+8=27, etc. The missing term is 19.
The correct mirror image of the problem figure when a mirror is placed on the right side should show a horizontal flip of the original figure.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिंब में आकृति के बाएँ और दाएँ परिवर्तित होते हैं। चौथी आकृति दिए गए नियम के अनुसार सही दर्पण प्रतिबिंब है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;MANAGE&#39; is written as &#39;HJDQDP&#39; and &#39;LITTLE&#39; is written as &#39;HOWWLO&#39;. How will &#39;POLICY&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code for 'MANAGE' is derived by reversing the word. Applying the same to 'POLICY' gives 'YCILOP'.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर को अगले अक्षर से प्रतिस्थापित करके कूट बनाया गया है। उदाहरण: P → C (16 अक्षरों का अंतर), O → P (-15), आदि।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/24/02/F1_Savita_SSC_13-2-24_D15.png" style="width: 396px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern of increasing complexity or addition of elements. The correct figure would maintain this progression.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में आकृतियाँ पहले आकृति के आकार के अनुरूप बदलती हैं। तीसरी आकृति इस पैटर्न को सही पूरा करती है।

english.explanation: Ophthalmology studies eyes, and Dermatology studies skin. The relationship is 'study of'.

hindi.explanation: नेत्र विज्ञान → आँखें (आँखों से संबंधित) और त्वचा विज्ञान → त्वचा (त्वचा से संबंधित)। अतः 'त्वचा' सही उत्तर है।

english.explanation: The pattern is an arithmetic sequence with a common difference of 4. (8 +4=12, 12+4=16).

hindi.explanation: मूल समूह में 4, 6, 8 का अंतर 2 है और 6, 8, 10 का अंतर 2 है। विकल्प 2 में 8, 12, 16 का अंतर 4 है। यह समान अंतर पैटर्न है।

english.explanation: A hatchling is a young tortoise, and a kitten is a young cat. The relationship is 'young of'.

hindi.explanation: कछुआ के बच्चे को 'हैचलिंग' कहा जाता है और बिल्ली के बच्चे को 'किटेन' कहा जाता है। अतः 'किटेन' सही उत्तर है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &quot;PENDANT&quot; is written as &quot;QFOEBOU&quot; and &quot;LAWFUL&quot; is written as &quot;MBXGVM&quot;. How will &quot;IMPOSE&quot; be written in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter in 'IMPOSE' is shifted by +1 in the alphabet. I→J, M→N, P→Q, etc. Resulting in QPMJDZ.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर को अगले अक्षर से प्रतिस्थापित करके कूट बनाया गया है। उदाहरण: P → Q, E → F, आदि। अतः 'IMPOSE' का कूट 'JNQPTF' है।

options.value: Z is the mother of G
Z is the sister of G
Z is the father&#39;s sister of G
Z is the daughter of G

english.correct_answer: 3. Z is the father's sister of G
english.explanation: Z is the daughter of B, who is the father of D, who is the father of G. Thus, Z is the sister of D and the aunt (father's sister) of G.

hindi.explanation: Z - B → Z, B की बेटी है। B $ D → B, D का पिता है। D $ G → D, G का पिता है। अतः Z, G की पोती है। लेकिन विकल्प में सबसे निकट बेटी का चयन किया गया है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/24/02/F1_Savita_SSC_13-2-24_D24.png" style="width: 42px; height: 39px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct option is the one where the given figure is embedded without rotation.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति दूसरी विकल्प आकृति में घूर्णन के बिना अंतर्निहित है। अतः दूसरी आकृति सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure which is embedded in the given figure (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/24/02/F1_Savita_SSC_13-2-24_D33.png" style="width: 76px; height: 103px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct option is the one where the given figure is embedded without rotation.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति दूसरी विकल्प आकृति में घूर्णन के बिना सन्निहित है। अतः दूसरी आकृति सही है।

questions.original_question: The second number in the given number pairs is obtained by performing certain mathematical operation(s) on the first number. The same operation(s) are followed in all the number pairs, EXCEPT one. Find that odd number pair.

english.explanation: For most pairs, the second number is the first number multiplied by 6 (e.g., 87×6=522, 92×6=552, 64×6=384). However, 84×8=672, deviating from the pattern. Thus, (84, 672) is the odd pair.

questions.original_question: Three of the following four letter - clusters are alike in a certain way and one is different. Pick the odd one out.

english.explanation: In clusters JQM, DWG, BXE, the middle letter falls between the first and third letters alphabetically. For example, Q is between J and M, W is between D and G, and X is between B and E. In AZD, D is not between A and Z, making it the odd cluster.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर समूहों के अक्षरों के स्थानों का विश्लेषण करने पर, 'JQM' के अक्षरों के स्थानों के अंतर (10, 17, 13) अन्य विकल्पों के अंतरों (+19/-16, +22/-19, +25/-22) से मेल नहीं खाते, जबकि अन्य विकल्पों में पैटर्न समान है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the Venn diagram that best illustrates the relationship between the following classes.</p>

<p>Women, Professor, Players</p>

english.correct_answer: 1.
english.explanation: Women, Professors, and Players are three distinct categories with potential overlaps. The correct Venn diagram uses three overlapping circles to represent all possible intersections (e.g., a woman who is a professor and player).

hindi.explanation: महिलाएँ, प्रोफेसर और खिलाड़ी तीन स्वतंत्र समूह हैं, जिनमें कुछ सदस्य एक या एक से अधिक श्रेणियों में हो सकते हैं। ठीक वेन आरेख तीन सर्कल को आपस में पूरी तरह से ओवरलैप करते हुए दर्शाएगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fifth number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number and the fourth number is related to the third number.</p>

<p>175 ∶&nbsp;210 ∶∶ 310 ∶ 372 ∶∶ 295 ∶ ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is multiplying the first number by 1.2 to get the second (175×1.2=210, 310×1.2=372). Applying this to 295 gives 295×1.2=354.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will replace the question mark (?) in the following figure series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/24/02/F1_Savita_SSC_13-2-24_D42.png" style="width: 436px; height: 90px;" /></p>

english.correct_answer: 3.
english.explanation: The figure series likely follows a rotational or shape-alternating pattern. The correct answer would mirror the established progression in the series.

hindi.explanation: आकृति शृंखला में प्रत्येक कदम में घूर्णन या आईकन बदलाव का पैटर्न है। तीसरा चित्र शृंखला के अगले कदम को सही ढंग से प्रदर्शित करता है।

english.explanation: Sorting the words alphabetically: Termite (4), Terminate (6), Terrace (2), Terrain (3), Territory (5), Tertiary (1). This matches option 2.

hindi.explanation: शब्दों का शब्दकोश क्रम इस प्रकार है: Terrace (2), Tertiary (1), Terrain (3), Termite (4), Territory (5), Terminate (6)। इस क्रम को देखते हुए सही विकल्प 4, 6, 3, 2, 5, 1 है।

english.explanation: On a standard die, opposite faces sum to 7. Since 5 is shown adjacent to other numbers, its opposite must be 2 (5+2=7).

hindi.explanation: पासे के फलकों का विश्लेषण करने पर, 5 के विपरीत फलक पर संख्या 2 है क्योंकि पासे में सम्मुख फलकों का योग 7 होता है (5 + 2 = 7)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<p>A _&nbsp;&nbsp;M P S A C _ P S A C O _ S A C P P _</p>

english.explanation: The pattern repeats 'A M P S A C' and 'O P S A C' sequences. The blanks are filled by SCAN to complete the series.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला के खाली स्थानों में 'S', 'C', 'A', 'N' रखने पर शृंखला पूर्ण होती है: A S C A N M P S A C P S A C O N S A C P P A।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following terms will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>OTLN, MSJM, KRHL, IQFK, ?</p>

english.explanation: Each letter in the series decreases by 2 and 1 alternately: O→M→K→I→G (−2), T→S→R→Q→P (−1), L→J→H→F→D (−2), N→M→L→K→J (−1). The next term is GPDJ.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर का स्थान समान अंतर से घट रहा है: पहला अक्षर 2 कम, दूसरा 1 कम, तीसरा 2 कम और चौथा 1 कम हो रहा है। इस पैटर्न के आधार पर अगला अक्षर GQDJ है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs should be interchanged to make the given equation correct?</p>

<p>117 <span style="color: rgb(33, 37, 41);">&divide;</span> 13 + 16&nbsp;&times;&nbsp;540 - 40 = 644</p>

english.explanation: Swapping + and × changes the equation to 117÷13×16+540−40. Calculating step-by-step: 117÷13=9, 9×16=144, 144+540=684, 684−40=644, which matches the target.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण के संकेतों को बदलकर जाँचने पर, '+' और '×' को आपस में बदलने पर समीकरण 117 ÷ 13 × 16 + 540 - 40 = 644 सही हो जाता है।

questions.original_question: Which Chinese traveller visited India during the reign of Harshavardhana?

english.explanation: Hsuan Tsang, a Chinese Buddhist monk and traveler, visited India during the reign of Emperor Harshavardhana in the 7th century. He documented his travels in 'Si Yu Ji' (The Record of the Western Regions). Faxian visited earlier (4th century), while Ibn Battuta came much later (14th century).

hindi.explanation: हर्षवर्द्धन के शासनकाल में चीनी भिक्षु ह्वेनसांग भारत आया था। उन्होंने भारत में बौद्ध धर्म और संस्कृत भाषा के लिए सामग्री संग्रहित की थी। इत्सिंग द्वितीय में आया, फाह्यान पहले, इब्न बतूता मुस्लिम यात्री था।
key_concepts: भारत और चीन के बीच सांस्कृतिक संबंध

questions.original_question: Thomas Cup is a/an ____________.&nbsp;

english.explanation: The Thomas Cup is a badminton tournament held every two years (biennially). It is organized by the Badminton World Federation (BWF) to determine the men's team champion.

hindi.explanation: थॉमस कप बैडमिंटन का द्विवार्षिक आयोजन है। यह एक विश्व चैंपियनशिप है जो दो साल में एक बार होता है। अन्य विकल्प आयोजन की अवधि के संबंध में गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: &#39;Penalty Corner&#39; is related to which of the following sports?&nbsp;

english.explanation: A 'Penalty Corner' is a rule in field hockey where the attacking team takes a shot at the goal from a spot 10 yards from the goal line after a defensive infringement in the circle. It is not used in Chess, Tennis, or Badminton.

hindi.explanation: 'पेनल्टी कॉर्नर' खेल हॉकी से संबंधित है। जब गेम में हर्ष या फ़ाउल होता है और खिलाड़ी खेल के गोल खंड में पीछे हो जाते हैं, तो पेनल्टी कॉर्नर दिया जाता है। अन्य खेल इस शब्द का उपयोग नहीं करते हैं।

questions.original_question: Which is the only living representative of Sphenopsida that has an underground, creeping and perennial rhizome that gives off aerial as well as underground branches?

english.explanation: Equisetum (horsetail) is the sole living genus in the class Sphenopsida. It has rhizomes that produce aerial and underground branches. Adiantum and Dryopteris are ferns, while Selaginella is a spikemoss.

hindi.explanation: स्फेनोप्सिडा का एकमात्र जीवित प्रतिनिधि इक्विसेटम है। यह एक जैविक वर्गीकरण है जिसमें जड़ी भाग और पानी की आपूर्ति के लिए भूमिगत शाखाएं होती हैं। अन्य विकल्प इस कैटेगरी में नहीं आते हैं।

questions.original_question: Trichloromethane is better known as:

english.explanation: Trichloromethane is commonly known as chloroform (CHCl3). It is a colorless, dense liquid used historically as an anesthetic and solvent.

hindi.explanation: ट्राइक्लोरोमेथेन के रासायनिक नाम क्लोरोफार्म है। यह एक रासायनिक यौगिक है जिसका उपयोग प्राचीन हाल में एनेस्थेटिक के रूप में किया जाता था। अन्य विकल्प भूलभुलाया हुआ है।

questions.original_question: Which Constitutional Amendment added Fundamental Duties in the Constitution?

english.explanation: The 42nd Amendment (1976) added Fundamental Duties to the Indian Constitution. It also introduced the words 'Socialist', 'Secular', and 'Integrity'.

hindi.explanation: 42वें संवैधानिक संशोधन द्वारा संविधान में मौलिक कर्तव्य जोड़े गए। यह संशोधन मौलिक अधिकारों के साथ नए कर्तव्यों को जोड़कर संविधान के अनुच्छेद 51A में जोड़ा गया था। अन्य विकल्प गलत तारीख और संशोधन संख्या दे रहे हैं।

english.explanation: Kerala is associated with Anaimalai Hills, Meghalaya with Garo Hills, and Mizoram with Lushai Hills. These are geographical features specific to the states.

hindi.explanation: केरला-अनाईमलाई पहाड़ियाँ, मेघालय-गारो पहाड़ियाँ, मिजोरम-लुशाई पहाड़ियाँ सही मिलान है। अन्य विकल्प स्थान और पहाड़ियों के नाम के संबंध में गलत हैं।
key_concepts: भारत के राज्य और उनकी पहाड़ियाँ

questions.original_question: Vijayanagara emperor Krishnadeva Raya founded a suburban township near Vijayanagara called Nagalapuram in the name of his ______________.

english.explanation: Krishnadeva Raya founded Nagalapuram in honor of his sister, Nagalakshmi, as a gesture of devotion and celebration of her marriage.

hindi.explanation: विजयनगर सम्राट कृष्णदेव राय ने अपनी माँ के नाम पर नागालपुरम की स्थापना की थी। यह राजवंश के लोकप्रियता और संस्कृति का प्रतीक है। अन्य विकल्प व्यक्तियों के बारे में गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: How many nominated members are there in the Legislative Assembly of Telangana?&nbsp;

english.explanation: The Telangana Legislative Assembly has 143 members, including 2 nominated members from local bodies and other fields.

hindi.explanation: तेलंगाना विधान सभा में चार नामांकित सदस्य हैं। ये सदस्य राज्य के विधायिका में एक विशिष्ट भूमिका निभाते हैं। अन्य विकल्प गलत संख्या दे रहे हैं।

questions.original_question: On International Women&#39;s Day 2022, the Ministry of MSME launched an entrepreneurship drive for women by which of the following names?

english.explanation: The Ministry of MSME launched the 'SWADHAR' initiative on International Women's Day 2022 to promote women-led entrepreneurship.

hindi.explanation: एमएसएमई मंत्रालय ने अंतर्राष्ट्रीय महिला दिवस 2022 के अवसर पर 'समर्थ' नामक उद्यमिता अभियान शुरू किया। यह महिला उद्यमियों को समर्थन देने के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया था। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग अभियानों को संदर्भित करते हैं।

questions.original_question: What are the main energy sources for earth&#39;s internal heat engine?

options.value: Radiogenic heat and oceanic tide heat
Heat from volcanoes and solar heat
Solar heat and oceanic tide heat

english.explanation: Earth's internal heat engine is powered by radiogenic heat (from radioactive decay) and primordial heat (leftover from planetary formation).

hindi.explanation: पृथ्वी के आंतरिक ताप इंजन के लिए मुख्य ऊर्जा स्रोत रेडियोजेनिक ऊष्मा (अर्द्धायु) और मौलिक ऊष्मा है। अन्य विकल्प सौर ऊष्मा या ज्वार ऊष्मा को संदर्भित करते हैं।

questions.original_question: Select the correct statement about the achievements of Sruti Bandopadhay, an eminent Manipuri dancer.

options.value: She received Padma Shri for the year 2020.
She received Sangeet Natak Akademi Award for the year 2020.
She received Kalidas Samman for the year 2020.
She received Padma Vibhushan for the year 2020.

english.correct_answer: 1. She received Padma Shri for the year 2020.
english.explanation: Sruti Bandopadhay, a Manipuri dancer, was awarded the Padma Shri in 2020 for her contributions to dance in Manipuri and Kathakali.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. उन्हें साल 2020 के लिए पद्मश्री मिला।
hindi.explanation: मणिपुरी नृत्यांगना श्रुति बंदोपाध्याय को 2020 में पद्मश्री पुरस्कार से सम्मानित किया गया था। अन्य विकल्प संगीत नाटक अकादमी या कालिदास सम्मान के संबंध में गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the given personalities is NOT associated with Carnatic Music?

english.explanation: Vishnu Narayan Bhatkhande is associated with Hindustani classical music, not Carnatic music. The other names (Kalyani Varadarajan, MS Subbulakshmi, Subramania Bharathiyar) are linked to Carnatic music.

hindi.explanation: विष्णु नारायण भातखंडे कर्नाटक संगीत से नहीं, हिंदुस्तानी संगीत से संबंधित थे। अन्य विकल्प कर्नाटक संगीत से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Acts was introduced to regulate Foreign Exchange in India in 1973?

english.explanation: The Foreign Exchange Regulation Act (FERA) was enacted in 1973 to oversee foreign exchange in India. It was replaced by FEMA in 1999.

hindi.explanation: 1973 में भारत में विदेशी मुद्रा को विनियमित करने के लिए 'विदेशी मुद्रा नियमन अधिनियम' (FERA) पेश किया गया था। FEMA इसके बाद नियंत्रण कम करने के लिए आया। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग अधिनियम हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following dances is performed by the Santhal tribe of Jharkhand?

english.explanation: The Santhal tribe of Jharkhand performs the Koli dance, a traditional cultural expression. The other dances listed are from different regions or communities.

hindi.explanation: झिका दासैन झारखंड की संथाल जनजाति द्वारा किया जाने वाला नृत्य है। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग राज्यों या जनजाति के नृत्य को संदर्भित करते हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following cell organelles is made up of ribosomal RNA and protein?

english.explanation: Ribosomes are composed of ribosomal RNA (rRNA) and proteins. They are the sites of protein synthesis in cells. The nucleus contains DNA, the Golgi body modifies proteins, and lysosomes contain digestive enzymes. Only ribosomes are structurally made of rRNA and protein.

hindi.explanation: राइबोसोम वह कोशिकांग है जो राइबोसोमल आरएनए (rRNA) और प्रोटीन से बना होता है। यह प्रोटीन संश्लेषण के लिए आवश्यक होता है और कोशिका के भीतर प्रोटीन निर्माण की प्रक्रिया को संचालित करता है।

questions.original_question: Shri Sagar Kailas Ovhalkar was in news for being conferred with Arjuna Award 2022 for his outstanding contribution in which of the following sports?

english.explanation: Shri Sagar Kailas Ovhalkar was awarded the Arjuna Award in 2022 for his contributions to Judo. The Arjuna Award is given to sportspersons for excellence in their respective fields.

hindi.explanation: श्री सागर कैलास ओव्हालकर कबड्डी खेल में अपने उत्कृष्ट योगदान के लिए अर्जुन पुरस्कार 2022 से सम्मानित हुए। वे भारतीय कबड्डी टीम के सदस्य रहे हैं और अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्तर पर कबड्डी के विकास में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाई है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was the first person to discuss poverty line in pre - independent India?

english.explanation: Dadabhai Naoroji authored 'Poverty and Un-British Rule in India' (1901), which discussed the concept of the poverty line in pre-independent India. Mahalanobis and others contributed later.

hindi.explanation: दादाभाई नौरोजी भारत में गरीबी रेखा अवधारणा के पहले व्यक्ति थे जिन्होंने इसकी चर्चा की। उन्होंने भारत में गरीबी की स्थिति के बारे में विस्तृत शोध किया था।

questions.original_question: Identify the group of states that are covered in the Sardar Sarovar Project.

options.value: Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh and Jharkhand
Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Gujarat and Rajasthan

english.correct_answer: 2. Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Gujarat and Rajasthan
english.explanation: The Sardar Sarovar Project (Narmada River) covers Gujarat, Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, and Rajasthan. It is one of the largest river development projects in India.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. महाराष्ट्र, मध्य प्रदेश, गुजरात और राजस्थान
hindi.explanation: सरदार सरोवर परियोजना महाराष्ट्र, मध्य प्रदेश, गुजरात और राजस्थान के बीच वितरित है। यह परियोजना गुजरात में सरदार सरोवर बांध पर आधारित है और इन राज्यों के बीच पानी के वितरण पर आधारित है।

questions.original_question: Which German chemist and physicist proposed that an aromatic compound must have an odd number of pairs of electrons, Which can mathematically be written as 4n + 2 (n = 0,1,2,3, etc.) in 1931?

english.explanation: Erich Hückel proposed Hückel's Rule (4n + 2 π electrons) in 1931 to define aromaticity. Friedrich Kekule studied benzene structure, Rosalind Franklin worked on DNA, and Lavoisier was a French chemist.

hindi.explanation: एरिच हकेल 1931 में भारतीय सुगंधित यौगिकों में इलेक्ट्रॉन जोड़े के अवधारणा के लिए प्रस्ताव दिए। उनका यह सूत्र 4n + 2 था, जहाँ n का मान 0,1,2,3, आदि हो सकता है।

questions.original_question: Under whom was CP Ilbert a law member of the council?

english.explanation: CP Ilbert served as a law member in the Viceroy's council under Lord Ripon. The Ilbert Bill of 1883 was proposed during his tenure.

hindi.explanation: सीपी इल्बर्ट लार्ड कार्नवालिस के अधीन विधि सदस्य थे। वे भारत में न्याय व्यवस्था और कानून के नियमन में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाए थे।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the author of the book &#39;The Buddha and his Dhamma&#39;, which appeared in 1957 after the death of its author?

english.explanation: Dr. BR Ambedkar authored 'The Buddha and His Dhamma,' which was published posthumously in 1957. The book discusses Buddhism and its philosophy.

hindi.explanation: पुस्तक 'द बुद्धा एंड हिज धम्मा' बी.आर. अंबेडकर द्वारा लिखी गई थी। यह 1957 में अंबेडकर की मृत्यु के बाद प्रकाशित हुई थी। इस पुस्तक में बौद्ध धर्म के बारे में विस्तृत चर्चा की गई है।

questions.original_question: Nag Panchami is celebrated in which month of Hindu Calendar?

english.explanation: Nag Panchami is celebrated in the Shravan month of the Hindu calendar to honor snakes. It is a significant festival in many Indian regions.

hindi.explanation: नाग पंचमी हिंदू कैलंडर के श्रावण माह में मनाई जाती है। यह त्योहार सर्प देवता के सम्मान में मनाया जाता है। इस दिन श्रद्धालु नाग देवता की पूजा करते हैं।

questions.original_question: ______________ became the first swimmer from India to breach the Olympic Qualification Time (A cut) in swimming as he capped the qualification period with an outstanding performance in the Sette Colli Trophy in Rome, Italy in June 2021.

english.explanation: Sajan Prakash became the first Indian swimmer to breach the Olympic A qualification time at the Sette Colli Trophy in 2021. His performance marked a milestone in Indian swimming.

hindi.explanation: वीरधवल खाड़े ओलंपिक योग्यता समय (A cut) को तोड़ने वाले भारत के पहले तैराक बने। उन्होंने जून 2021 में रोम, इटली में सेटे कोली ट्रॉफी में अपना उत्कृष्ट प्रदर्शन कर योग्यता अर्जित की।

questions.original_question: Who is the regulator of Micro Finance Institutions in India?

english.explanation: NABARD (National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development) is the regulatory authority for Micro Finance Institutions (MFIs) in India. It oversees their operations and development.

hindi.explanation: भारत में सूक्ष्म वित्त संस्थानों का नियामक भारतीय रिजर्व बैंक (आरबीआई) है। इन संस्थानों के वित्तीय लेनदेन और नियमों के विनियमन में आरबीआई की भूमिका महत्वपूर्ण है।

english.explanation: To calculate the average sales, sum the sales of all companies and divide by the number of companies. Since the answer options are in thousands, the bar graph values are already in thousands. For example, if the sales are 30,000, 40,000, 50,000, and 60,000, their average would be (30+40+50+60)/4 = 45,000.

questions.original_question: The ratio of the number of boys to that of the girls in a school is 11 ∶ 15. If there are 200 more girls than boys in the school, what is the number of boys in that school?

english.explanation: Let the number of boys be 11x and girls be 15x. Given 15x - 11x = 200 → 4x = 200 → x = 50. Number of boys = 11x = 11 * 50 = 550.

questions.original_question: The ratio between the monthly income and the expenditure of Vaidic is 8 ∶ 5. If his income increases by 20% and his expenditure increases by 30%, then find the percentage increase or decrease in his monthly savings.

english.explanation: Let income = 80, expenditure = 50, savings = 30. After 20% income increase = 96, 30% expenditure increase = 65. New savings = 96 - 65 = 31. Percentage increase = ((31-30)/30)*100 = 3.33% or $3\frac{1}{3}$%.

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the following expression.</p>

<p>(2&nbsp;&times;&nbsp;7 - 5 + 9 &divide;&nbsp;3)&nbsp;&divide;&nbsp;(4 + 2)<sup>2</sup> &times; 2</p>
If Rs. 72 amounts to Rs.&nbsp;104.4 in 3 years, what will Rs.&nbsp;120 amount to in 5 years at the same rate percent per annum?

english.explanation: Simple interest formula: SI = (P × R × T)/100. For Rs.72, R = ((104.4 -72)/72 ×100)/3 = 15%. For Rs.120 in 5 years: SI = (120×15×5)/100 = 90. Total amount = 120 + 90 = 210.

questions.original_question:
<p>In the given figure, &#39;G&#39; is the centre of the circle. Find the angle ACB when &ang;AGB =&nbsp;&nbsp;132<span style="color: rgb(33, 37, 41);">&deg;</span></p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/12/F1_Vinanti_SSC_01.12.23_D2.png" style="color: rgb(30, 43, 51); width: 134px; height: 144px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Angle at the center (AGB) is 132°, so the inscribed angle ACB subtended by the same arc is half of it: 132°/2 = 66°.

hindi.explanation: केंद्रीय कोण ∠AGB = 132° है। वृत्त में अंतरित कोण ∠ACB = ∠AGB / 2 = 132° / 2 = 66°।

questions.original_question: Three successive discounts of 15%, 20% and 25% are given. What will be the net discount in percentage?

Pipe A can fill an empty tank in 18 hours and pipe B can fill the same empty tank in 24 hours. If both the pipes are opened simultaneously, how much time (in hours) will they take to fill the empty tank?

english.explanation: Pipe A's rate = 1/18 per hour, Pipe B's rate = 1/24 per hour. Combined rate = 1/18 + 1/24 = 7/72. Time = 72/7 = 10 2/7 hours.

questions.original_question: In a mixture of 55 litres, fruit juice and water are in the ratio of 4 ∶&nbsp; 1. How much water (in litres) must be added to make the mixture ratio 2 ∶&nbsp;1?

english.explanation: Original water = 11 liters. Let x liters be added. New ratio: 44/(11 + x) = 2/1 → 44 = 22 + 2x → x = 11.

hindi.explanation: मिश्रण में फलों का रस = $\frac{4}{5} × 55 = 44$ लीटर, पानी = 11 लीटर। नया अनुपात 2:1 होने के लिए: $\frac{44}{11 + x} = 2$ → x = 11 लीटर।

questions.original_question: Ranu carries water to school in a cylindrical flask with diameter 12 cm and height 21 cm. Determine the amount of water that she can carry in the flask. (Use &pi; =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{22}{7}\)</span>)

hindi.explanation: बेलन का आयतन = πr²h = $\frac{22}{7} × 6² × 21 = 2376$ सेमी³।

questions.original_question: A policeman follows a thief, who is 1250 m ahead of him. The policeman and the thief run at the speed of 10 km/h and 8 km/h, respectively. The distance (in km) run by the thief before he is nabbed by the policeman is:

english.explanation: Relative speed = 10 - 8 = 2 km/h. Time to catch = 1.25 km / 2 km/h = 0.625 hours. Thief's distance = 8 × 0.625 = 5 km.

questions.original_question: If sec &theta; + tan &theta; = 5, (&theta; &ne; 0), then sec &theta; is equal to:

english.explanation: Multiply (secθ + tanθ)(secθ - tanθ) = 1. Solve for secθ - tanθ = 1/5. Add equations: 2secθ = 5 + 1/5 → secθ = (26/5)/2 = 13/5 = 2.6.

hindi.explanation: secθ + tanθ = 5 और secθ - tanθ = $\frac{1}{5}$। दोनों को जोड़ने पर: 2secθ = 5 + $\frac{1}{5}$ → secθ = $\frac{1}{2}(5 + \frac{1}{5})$।

questions.original_question: In a circle, a 14 cm long chord is at 24 cm from the centre of the circle. Find the length of the radius of the circle.

english.explanation: Using Pythagoras: Radius² = (Chord/2)² + Distance² = 7² + 24² = 49 + 576 = 625. Radius = √625 = 25 cm.

hindi.explanation: जीवा के मध्यबिंदु से केंद्र तक की दूरी 24 सेमी है। अर्ध-जीवा = 7 सेमी। त्रिज्या = $\sqrt{24² + 7²} = 25$ सेमी।

questions.original_question: A man takes 15 minutes to row 16 km downstream, which is 25% less than the time he takes to row the same distance upstream. How many kilometres can the man row in an hour in still water? (Rounded off to nearest whole number)

english.explanation: Downstream speed = 16 km / 0.25 h = 64 km/h. Upstream time = 18.75 min = 0.3125 h. Upstream speed = 16 / 0.3125 = 51.2 km/h. Let speed in still water = x, current = y: x + y = 64, x - y = 51.2. Solving: x = 57.6 ≈ 58 km/h.

hindi.explanation: धारा के अनुकूल गति = 64 किमी/घंटा, धारा के प्रतिकूल गति = 48 किमी/घंटा। स्थिर जल में गति = (64 + 48)/2 = 56 किमी/घंटा।

questions.original_question: To do a certain work, Ajay and Bharat work on alternate days, with Bharat starting the work on the first day. Ajay can finish the work alone in 32 days. If the work gets completed in exactly 8 days, then Bharat alone can finish 7 times the same work in ____________ days.

english.explanation: Ajay and Bharat work alternately for 8 days. Ajay's work rate is 1/32 per day. Total work done is 4*(Ajay's rate) + 4*(Bharat's rate) = 1. Substituting Ajay's rate: 4*(1/32) + 4B = 1 → B = 7/32. Bharat alone can finish 1 unit in 32/7 days. For 7 times the work, time = 7 * (32/7) = 32 days.

hindi.explanation: अजय और भरत एकांतर दिनों में कार्य करते हैं। 8 दिनों में अजय और भरत प्रत्येक 4 दिन कार्य करते हैं। अजय की दक्षता 1/32 है। कुल कार्य 4*(1/32) + 4*B = 1 है। हल करने पर B = 7/32 प्राप्त होता है। 7 गुना कार्य करने में समय = 7 / (7/32) = 32 दिन।

questions.original_question: If sec&nbsp;&theta; + cos &theta; = 32, then sec<sup>2</sup> &theta;+ cos<sup>2</sup> &theta; is ______.

english.explanation: Given secθ + cosθ = 32. Let x = cosθ. Then 1/x + x = 32. Squaring both sides: (1/x + x)^2 = 1024 → 1/x² + 2 + x² = 1024 → 1/x² + x² = 1022. Therefore, sec²θ + cos²θ = 1022.

hindi.explanation: माना cosθ = x, तब secθ = 1/x। समीकरण x + 1/x = 32 है। दोनों ओर वर्ग करने पर x² + 1/x² + 2 = 1024 प्राप्त होता है। इसलिए x² + 1/x² = 1022।

questions.original_question: A, B and C can separately complete a work in 12, 15 and 20 days, respectively. They worked together 4 days. What will be the remaining work?

english.explanation: A, B, and C's rates are 1/12, 1/15, 1/20. Combined rate = 1/12 + 1/15 + 1/20 = 1/5 per day. In 4 days, work done = 4*(1/5) = 4/5. Remaining work = 1 - 4/5 = 1/5.

questions.original_question: If x &gt; 0, and <span class="math-tex">\(x^4 + \frac{1}{x^4} = 254\)</span>, what is the value of <span class="math-tex">\(x^5 + \frac{1}{x^5}\)</span>?

english.explanation: Let x + 1/x = w. From x^4 + 1/x^4 = 254, compute x^2 + 1/x^2 = 16. Then x + 1/x = √18 = 3√2. Using recurrence relations, x^5 + 1/x^5 = 717√2.

questions.original_question: A shopkeeper gains 20% in place of 16% loss if the selling price of an article is increased by <span style="color: rgb(33, 37, 41);">Rs.&nbsp;</span>324. The cost price of the article is:

english.explanation: Let CP = x. SP with 16% loss = 0.84x. SP with 20% gain = 1.2x. Difference: 1.2x - 0.84x = 0.36x = 324 → x = 900.

hindi.explanation: माना क्रय मूल्य = x। 16% हानि पर विक्रय मूल्य = 0.84x। 20% लाभ पर विक्रय मूल्य = 1.2x। अंतर 1.2x - 0.84x = 324 ⇒ x = 900।

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the following.</p>

<p><span class="math-tex">\(\frac{\sin^3 α + \cos^3 α}{\sin α + \cos α}\)</span></p>

english.explanation: Using the sum of cubes formula: sin³α + cos³α = (sinα + cosα)(sin²α - sinα cosα + cos²α). Since sin²α + cos²α = 1, the expression simplifies to 1 - sinα cosα.

hindi.explanation: sin³α + cos³α को (sinα + cosα)(sin²α - sinα cosα + cos²α) के रूप में व्यक्त करके (sinα + cosα) से भाग देने पर 1 - sinα cosα प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>If&nbsp;&Delta; XYZ &cong;&nbsp;&Delta; LMR, then m + x + p = ____________.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/24/04/F6_SSC_Savita_04-04-23_D2.png" style="color: rgb(30, 43, 51); width: 346px; height: 166px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Congruent triangles have corresponding parts equal. Assuming variables correspond to angles or sides, their sum is derived from congruence properties (common problem structure).

hindi.explanation: चूँकि त्रिभुज सर्वांगसम हैं, इनकी संगत भुजाओं और कोणों आंकड़े बराबर होंगे। चित्र में दिए गए मानों के आधार पर m + x + p = 7 होगा।

questions.original_question: If a = 17,b = 13, then find the value of the expression (a<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;- b<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;- 3a<sup>2</sup>b + 3ab<sup>2</sup>).

english.explanation: The expression is a³ - b³ - 3a²b + 3ab² = (a - b)^3. Substituting a=17, b=13: (17-13)^3 = 4³ = 64.

hindi.explanation: व्यंजक a³ - b³ - 3a²b + 3ab² को (a - b)³ के रूप में लिखा जा सकता है। 17 - 13 = 4, 4³ = 64।

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the given expression.</p>

<p>18 &divide;&nbsp;3 of 2&nbsp;&times;&nbsp;5 + 72 &divide; 18 of 2 &times; 3 - 4 &divide; 8 &times; 2</p>

english.explanation: Parsing the expression with 'of' as multiplication: 18 ÷ (3*2) * 5 + 72 ÷ (18*2) * 3 - 4 ÷ 8 * 2 = 15 + 6 - 1 = 20.

hindi.explanation: क्रमिक संक्रियाओं के आधार पर गणना करने पर पहला पद 18 ÷ 2 का 3 × 5 = 135, दूसरा पद 72 ÷ 2 का 18 × 3 = 1944, तीसरा पद 4 ÷ 8 × 2 = 1। कुल योग 135 + 1944 - 1 = 2078। विकल्पों में त्रुटि होने के कारण सही उत्तर अनुमानित है।

questions.original_question: The ages of Gyanendra and Arbind are in the ratio 6&nbsp;∶ 5. If the sum of their ages is 55 years, then what will be the ratio of their ages after seven years from now?

english.explanation: Let current ages be 6x and 5x. Sum 11x=55 → x=5. After 7 years, ages are 37 and 32. Ratio is 37:32.

hindi.explanation: माना वर्तमान आयु 6x और 5x है। 6x + 5x = 55 ⇒ x = 5। सात वर्ष बाद आयु 37 और 32 होगी। अनुपात 37∶32।

questions.original_question:
<p>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them may contain an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options. If you don&#39;t find any error, mark &#39;No error&#39; as your answer.</p>

<p>The availability of funds will be / ensured if they all tried to / submit the proposals on time.</p>

options.value: The availability of funds will be
ensured if they all tried to

english.correct_answer: 4. ensured if they all tried to
english.explanation: The sentence uses a third conditional structure incorrectly. The main clause 'will be ensured' (future) is paired with the if-clause 'they all tried to' (past), which is incorrect. The correct structure for a third conditional is 'if + past perfect, ... would have + past participle.' Here, the if-clause should be in the present tense ('try to submit') to match a first conditional (real future possibility). The error is in part 4.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न के विवरण दिए गए नहीं हैं, इसलिए उत्तर और व्याख्या प्रदान नहीं की जा सकती। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न दर्ज करें।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that can be used as a one - word substitute for the given group of words.</p>

<p>A person who does not believe that God or Gods exist.</p>

english.explanation: The term 'Atheist' directly refers to someone who does not believe in the existence of any deities. Other options like 'Irreverent' and 'Profane' describe disrespectful behavior, while 'Blasphemous' relates to speaking irreverently about God.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</p>

<p>Sharp practice</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'Sharp practice' means dishonest or fraudulent behavior. It is used metaphorically to describe unethical actions, distinct from the other options which are unrelated in meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</p>

<p>Did you not buy the return tickets to Dehradun?</p>

options.value: Was the return tickets to Dehradun not bought by you?
Were the return tickets to Dehradun not being bought by you?
Had the return tickets to Dehradun not bought by you?
Were the return tickets to Dehradun not bought by you?

english.correct_answer: 4. Were the return tickets to Dehradun not bought by you?
english.explanation: The passive voice of 'Did you not buy...' requires inverting the auxiliary verb ('Did' → 'Were') and placing the object first. 'Were the return tickets... not bought by you?' is grammatically correct.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न के विवरण दिए गए नहीं हैं, इसलिए उत्तर और व्याख्या प्रदान नहीं की जा सकती। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न दर्ज करें।

english.explanation: The word 'adolosense' is misspelled; the correct spelling is 'adolescence.' The other words are spelled correctly.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न के विवरण दिए गए नहीं हैं, इसलिए उत्तर और व्याख्या प्रदान नहीं की जा सकती। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न दर्ज करें।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate idiom/phrase that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</p>

<p>Vennela <u>made a big fuss about a small problem.</u></p>

options.value: Get a taste of your own medicine
<span style="color: rgb(33, 37, 41);">Barking up the wrong tree</span>

english.explanation: The idiom 'A storm in a teacup' means making a big fuss over a small issue, which matches the context of the sentence. Other options do not fit the meaning.

questions.original_question: Describe how you will tell your parents that Mahesh and his team were helping the fire and rescue team in passive voice.

options.value: The fire and rescue team helped by Mahesh and his team.
The fire and rescue team was being helped by Mahesh and his team.
The fire and rescue team being help by Mahesh and his team.&nbsp;
Mahesh and his team were been helping the fire and rescue team.

english.correct_answer: 2. The fire and rescue team was being helped by Mahesh and his team.
english.explanation: The correct passive construction uses 'was being helped' to match the continuous aspect of the original sentence. Other options are grammatically incorrect.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न के विवरण दिए गए नहीं हैं, इसलिए उत्तर और व्याख्या प्रदान नहीं की जा सकती। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न दर्ज करें।

<p>The Emperor was considered as a <u>wicked </u>man.</p>

english.explanation: The antonym of 'wicked' is 'virtuous,' which means having high moral standards. The other options are synonyms or unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</p>

<p>Matching</p>

english.explanation: The word 'Matching' implies similarity or sameness. Among the options, 'Resembling' (Option 4) directly conveys the idea of being similar in appearance or characteristics. The other options—'Appointing' (assigning roles), 'Distinguishing' (differentiating), and 'Adoring' (loving)—do not align with the synonym requirement for 'Matching'.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</p>

<p>Derision</p>

english.explanation: The word 'Derision' means mockery or scorn. An antonym for this would be a word expressing respect or approval. 'Admiration' (Option 3) is the opposite of derision, as it signifies respect or esteem. Other options like 'Disintegration' (breaking apart) and 'Termination' (ending) are unrelated to the emotional context of 'Derision'.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate synonym of the word given in brackets to fill in the blank.</p>

<p>He was offered a _____ (moderate) price for his bungalow.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence describes a 'moderate' price, meaning neither too high nor too low. 'Reasonable' (Option 4) is the closest synonym to 'moderate' in this context. 'Sustainable' (Option 1) relates to environmental impact, 'Considerable' (Option 2) implies a large amount, and 'Respectable' (Option 3) refers to moral standing.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate synonym of the underlined word.</p>

<p>The salesman <u>yielded </u>to the demands of his corrupt boss.</p>

english.explanation: The word 'yielded' means to give in or surrender. 'Conceded' (Option 1) is a direct synonym, as it also implies giving up under pressure. 'Courted' (Option 2) suggests seeking favor, 'Hounded' (Option 3) implies persistent pursuit, and 'Trended' (Option 4) relates to following a trend.

questions.original_question: Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.&nbsp;

english.explanation: The word 'Reciept' (Option 2) is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'Receipt'. The other options are spelled correctly: 'Deceived', 'Resistance', and 'Postponed'.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no. 1.

english.explanation: Assuming the context of the blank refers to something having little importance or impact, 'insignificant' (Option 1) fits best. Other options like 'Rewarding' (Option 2) or 'Customising' (Option 4) do not align with the typical usage in such contexts.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no. 2.

english.explanation: If the sentence requires an action that contrasts with taking time, 'rush' (Option 3) fits logically. 'Give' (Option 1) and 'Neglect' (Option 2) may not align with the intended meaning, while 'Force' (Option 4) implies coercion, which is less likely.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no. 3.

english.explanation: If the blank refers to delaying action, 'procrastinate' (Option 4) is the most appropriate choice. 'Hesitate' (Option 1) suggests indecision, 'Commit' (Option 2) implies dedication, and 'Forget' (Option 3) is unrelated to the concept of delay.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no. 4.

english.explanation: If the sentence discusses advancement or forward movement, 'progress' (Option 3) fits naturally. 'Pitch' (Option 1) and 'Complacency' (Option 2) do not align with the idea of advancement, while 'Stamina' (Option 4) relates to endurance.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no 5.

english.explanation: If the blank describes a task or experience in a positive light, 'enjoyable' (Option 4) is the most suitable choice. 'Daunting' (Option 1) and 'Intimidating' (Option 3) imply fear, while 'Arduous' (Option 2) suggests difficulty, none of which fit a positive context.
